Entries.Trailer_Entry: Penny! Did you make dinner?/Penny! You done your jobs?/Penny! You home?/Hey! I'm home!
Entries.Fri2: You know, I've been thinking... I wish I had a hobby. Something to do other than hanging around at that saloon every night.#$e#You got any ideas?#$e#...Ehh. Maybe I'll play draughts against myself.
Entries.winter_Sat: I ought to take up fishin', seein' as how close the river is.
